name: Fat Dragon Lite
description:
Free version of Fat Dragon!
Fat Dragon Lite contains 6 levels, get the full version for access to over 90 fun and challenging levels.

Help Fat Dragon get fatter by eating all of the desserts and avoiding spikes and holes. Guide him by drawing a path for him to follow. Sounds simple enough right? The catch is that when you enter draw mode, the obstacles and desserts disappear. Use ground references and your short term memory to draw the best path. Avoid obstacles and eat all of the desserts to win each level.

Try to get a 3 cupcake rating for each level in Arcade mode or go for a High Score in Story mode.
